'''15th Critics' Choice Awards'''
January 15, 2010
---- Best Picture:
''' The Hurt Locker '''
The '''15th [[Broadcast Film Critics Association Awards|Critics' Choice Awards]]''' were presented on Friday, January 15, 2010 at the Hollywood Palladium to honour the finest achievements in [[2009 in film|2009 film-making]], on January 15, 2010 on [[VH1]].
